title: MrGunner2013
author: MrGunner2013
content: What do you guys think of the Golden Triumph paintings / prints that Peter Schiff partnered with the Artist market price to do. He’s also inscribing them onto Bitcoin ordinals.I kinda feel like there might be a unique collectors desire for them with in the Crypto community. Either signifying Peters capitulation with BTC or just being singed by 2 known ppl and put into the BTC chain. Link below to site.https://www.1marketprice.com/golden

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: So the gold bug Peter Schiff goes by Trump recipe and after bashing bitcoin in all the way he could (in writing), now he tries to make money off it? And people even advertise that in here? Why?? Oh, why???!!??Do I have to tell explicitly that I find this as a no-go for anybody who cares about Bitcoin?

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: Also if you got one what do you think would be the best thing to inscribe onto the Bitcoin ordinal?

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on June 17, 2023, 06:21:27 PMSo the gold bug Peter Schiff goes by Trump recipe and after bashing bitcoin in all the way he could (in writing), now he tries to make money off it? And people even advertise that in here? Why?? Oh, why???!!??Do I have to tell explicitly that I find this as a no-go for anybody who cares about Bitcoin?Lol alright chill. It’s already ended so no advertising. And we are collectors there’s many factors that could make something very collectible I’m trying to figure out if this could have one of the factors.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Not sure what to think of these....They could've done a better job for sure.  I have known about Peter Schiff and his love for gold....kinda surprised he has entered the cryptosphere.  He should've at least paid tribute to BTC somewhere in there!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: MrGunner2013 on June 17, 2023, 06:07:06 PMWhat do you guys think of the Golden Triumph paintings / prints that Peter Schiff partnered with the Artist market price to do. He’s also inscribing them onto Bitcoin ordinals.I kinda feel like there might be a unique collectors desire for them with in the Crypto community. Either signifying Peters capitulation with BTC or just being singed by 2 known ppl and put into the BTC chain. Link below to site.Code:https://www.1marketprice.com/goldenWARNING - do not visit this 1marketprice website! The link provided by OP immediatelly causes a virus alert prompt!Most scanners seem to not care about the site, but I was able to replicate the warning with Seclookup and Avast.

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 18, 2023, 10:45:10 PMQuote from: MrGunner2013 on June 17, 2023, 06:07:06 PMWhat do you guys think of the Golden Triumph paintings / prints that Peter Schiff partnered with the Artist market price to do. He’s also inscribing them onto Bitcoin ordinals.I kinda feel like there might be a unique collectors desire for them with in the Crypto community. Link below to site.Code:https://www.1marketprice.com/goldenWARNING - do not visit this 1marketprice website! The link provided by OP immediatelly causes a virus alert prompt!Most scanners seem to not care about the site, but I was able to replicate the warning with Seclookup and Avast.Weird you can verify this is the exact link Peter has posted

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Yes I got the same virus warning thru Avaste Virus.....so proceed with caution as this might be an infected website.  I didn't go any further..why take a chance? Maybe the OP can explain better why this is popping up!   Its infected with the URL:BLACKLIST virus?

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: No idea. I visit most stuff on my iPhone so I didn’t get any pop up and if I need to do any crypto stuff I have a separate off-line air gapped laptop I do stuff on.

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: Imagine if Peter Schiff got someBitcoiners Rekt…

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on June 17, 2023, 07:43:06 PM Not sure what to think of these....They could've done a better job for sure.  I have known about Peter Schiff and his love for gold....kinda surprised he has entered the cryptosphere.  He should've at least paid tribute to BTC somewhere in there!  Given the prices and big names on board, it looks like one of those things where influencers are given money and product to promote a brand for the sake of parting people from their BTC. Maybe I’m wrong, but so far all the Ordinals collections available don’t have any function other than looking pretty right? I wish the space would build something that did something. Community organizations that share proceeds with members have been around for more than a decade… That’s why this first round of tokens on the Bitcoin blockchain feel like nothing more than a grift to me, but I do have high hopes for the future when someone makes an inscription that does anything.

comments.author: !BTCTB!
comments.body: One of those Peter Schiff prints is actually selling on eBay right now:https://www.ebay.com/itm/295799814253
